_header: The boars head have we in brought
_description: A Boar’s Head carol — a fragment of one quatrain (aaab)

CamStJohn259.Transcription:
Þe borys hed haue we in broȝhtLok ȝe be mery in herte
                    & thoȝht& he þat all þis world has wrowtSaue
                    ȝow & eke me
